page.title: 06BUSINESS - THREE MOSSES
page.content: The largest business in this area is L.O. Jeffs Ltd., having a staff of over 220, either from the immediate area or who are brought from outlying districts by private bus. The business has been on the site of a former sack making factory for over 20 years. The packing of locally grown produce is carried out her, then distributed by the firms lorries to supermarkets such as Sainsbury's and Marks and Spencer. There are four shops in Haskayne, the only small business premises in the whole of the Three Mosses. The Post Office shares the property with the Hairdresser, while one shop is at present vacant, the other two are a Sweets and Tobacconist, the other an Off Licence Wine shop. There are 8 farms, 2 commercial boarding kennels and a small hortcultural concern also.
